title: High-Quality Video Playback
requirement:
Provide a seamless video streaming experience across multiple resolutions (480p to 4K) with autoplay, subtitles, and adjustable playback speed.  
#### Screens:  
- **Video Player Screen**: Includes resolution selectors, speed controls, and subtitle support.  
#### Personas:  
- **Viewers**: Seek a high-quality and customizable playback experience.
